org.promasi.model
Class Accountant

java.lang.Object
  org.promasi.model.Person
      org.promasi.model.Accountant

public class Accountant
extends Person

Represents the accountant of the company. The accountant is responsible for hiring\firing and paying the employees.

Author:
eddiefullmetal
